channel.title: How to Change Teleport places (From your spellbook)
channel.description:
[b]First of all this is for beginners![/b] [b]And it only works at a 317 server[/b] Hey! Welcome to my guide , I hope you understand me. Lets get started! [b]Difficult[/b] : 1/10 Files we need : Clickingmost.java (Maby Client.java) Open up your server and click on a teleport in your spellbook. If you are on your place typ : ::mypos or ::getcoords! If you dont have this command pleas insert this to your [b]client.java[/b].
if(command.startsWith("mypos") && playerRights > 0){ sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+""); }
[b](^This ::Mypos command above is maded for Mod+)[/b] [b]You will see this :[/b] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2lmqec4.jpg[/img] After that note the coords and go into your "clickingMost.java" Search for your first coord. (Ctrl + f) [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2chnk21.jpg[/img] [b]Change the 0 to change the high level. (0 is the ground)[/b] If you found him you can change it to anything you want! After you changed it : Safe it , Compile it. And enjoy :) Thank you for reading my TUT! [b]Got any problems? Pm me or post ur problem in the comments![/b] Youridudock. Special thx to Www.tinypic.com for uploading my Screenshots!

item.title: How to Change Teleport places (From your spellbook)

item.description:
@si_force wrote:

This would be considered a snippet in most peoples opinion, so feel free to add it to this thread. Cheers. Well done for the effort too.

Read full topic

item.title: How to Change Teleport places (From your spellbook)
item.dc:creator: @_ZeroScape `ZeroScape
item.description:
@_ZeroScape wrote:

You didn’t explain anything (like the triggerTele(int, int, int) method…) nor did you tell how to get the button ID for the specific spells. This is most likely an “How to change the Falador teleport’s destination” guide.

You misspelled the word maybe.

The 3-line command you merged into this didn’t even have conventions… THREE FUCKING LINES!

Not even a snippet tbh.

Edit:
Sometimes the teleportation spells uses an randomizer, to randomize the destination to a 3x3 square. Good luck using your method getting the correct ID without a few attempts.

Read full topic
item.source: How to Change Teleport places (From your spellbook)

item.title: How to Change Teleport places (From your spellbook)
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

First of all this is for beginners!
And it only works at a 317 server

Hey! Welcome to my guide , I hope you understand me. Lets get started!

Difficult : 1/10
Files we need : Clickingmost.java (Maby Client.java)

Open up your server and click on a teleport in your spellbook.
If you are on your place typ : ::mypos or ::getcoords!

If you dont have this command pleas insert this to your client.java.

if(command.startsWith("mypos") && playerRights > 0){ sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+""); }

(^This ::Mypos command above is maded for Mod+)

You will see this :

2lmqec4.jpg766×507

After that note the coords and go into your “clickingMost.java”

Search for your first coord. (Ctrl + f)

2chnk21.jpg797×126

Change the 0 to change the high level. (0 is the ground)

If you found him you can change it to anything you want!

After you changed it : Safe it , Compile it. And enjoy

Thank you for reading my TUT!

Got any problems? Pm me or post ur problem in the comments!

Youridudock.

Special thx to Www.tinypic.com for uploading my Screenshots!

Read full topic
item.source: How to Change Teleport places (From your spellbook)
